Member Function Documentation

void Circuit::add_component ( const char *  component_class  ) 

Adds a component to the circuit.

The possible components are: AND, NAND, OR, NOR, LED, Node, Inverter, Switch, Positive, Negative

Parameters:
component_class the class of the component to be added

void Circuit::unwire ( unsigned  component_output,
unsigned  component_input 
)

Unwires two component.

Unwires the first parameter's output from the second parameter's input.

Parameters:
component_output the source component

Friends And Related Function Documentation

std::ostream& operator<< ( std::ostream &  os,
Circuit *  circuit 
) [friend]

Writes the circuit to an output stream.

This will serialize the circuit and writes out the text representation of it. The circuit will be easily backed up from its text.

Parameters:
os output stream
circuit the circuit
